ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 23
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found with my duel combine scim s that i double and trip and quad attack very often you may want to try that.
ygData.messageBody:
I have found with my duel combine scim's that i double and trip and quad
attack very often you may want to try that.
On Sun, 23 May 1999, Paul Jesernig wrote:

> From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
>
> I'm going the big two handed sword route myself (a shiny brass halberd is
> my weapon now), but what I have heard from a source I trust (my guild
> leader who was a warrior like I was in beta) is to put the faster weapon in
> your main hand. The 2nd attack goes based on when the first one does. The
> more often the first one swings, the more often the 2nd does also. Spirit
> of the bear, a shaman spell, though others may get it also, will keep your
> stamina up.
>
> Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
>
>
>
>
> Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >Have a Mino Axe and a bastard sword. both 8dmg and 32/35.
>
> Keep this combination of weapons?
> If not, which should I switch?
> Does it matter which is in my primary had?<
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
